snippet: Juventus clinched a fourth straight Serie A title with a 1-0 win at Sampdoria on Saturday but postponed its trophy celebrations with a crucial Champions League match in just three days.
abstract: Soccer Roundup; Juventus defeats Sampdoria, 1-0, to clinch its fourth straight Serie A title; other soccer matches noted.
lead_paragraph: Juventus clinched a fourth straight Serie A title with a 1-0 win at Sampdoria on Saturday but postponed its trophy celebrations with a crucial Champions League match in just three days.

headline.main: Juventus Claims Fourth Consecutive Italian Title
headline.print_headline: Juventus Claims Fourth Consecutive Italian Title
